default.note: Hello! You're not supposed to be here...

katie.note:
Hai Katieeeee ! 

I'm so grateful to have met you this year. I sort of knew what I was risking by reaching out to you initially, but I didn't think that getting to know you better would be so fun. Although it might be hard to say anything committal at this stage since our story has just begun, but I hope that someday we'll be able to call each other a second home. Here's to more memories in college, ACM, and in our lives beyond. I'll support you even if we have to be apart for a little while, but to be honest, I think I might just want to go where you go, but we will see. :)

This might be a bit unconventional, and it isn't exactly the most "letter" letter, but I hope you enjoy it. Merry Christmas Katie !

- Widjaja :3

giftItems.title: Favorite person I met this year award
